text: I had a convo with some people yesterday about HubSpot FTP and how useful it is for transferring fields. I wrote a blog about the method I use. It also can clear up some confusion about how to use the advanced features module in the CrankShaft repo. <https://www.spingroup.com/blog/2018/10/29/how-to-add-fields-to-custom-modules-via-HubSpots-ftp>
